Stick with this for a while.  I can only allocate 20kb upstream which means it's going to take a few days (a week?) to get the entire thing out there.

After that, keep seeding it please.  I think you'll find it's worth it.

Cheers,
Brian

NisseP:

I tried to translate.  Here's what it said:

"Mine standardfråga : Have I this? Nåja Self sheep welfare fraught home un collapse. Cheers incidentally rh128592."

I guess free translations still need some work.
I'm very surprised how many people are interested in this torrent.  It's coming, albeit very very slowly but surely.  Hang in there, seed it when it's done.
